author: sebb
msg: Allow for multiple local UDP ports

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2771 Fix Foundation and Mika platform issues:
PrivilegedActionException: use getException() instead of getCause()

author: coheigea
msg: - Changed how Transforms are loaded. Previously the Class was loaded and inserted into a static HashMap, and then another static HashMap kept track of instances which were loaded when required. To simplify things, there is now a single ConcurrentHashMap that loads implementations when registered.

author: ejiang
msg: ARIES-566: NPE when generating repository.xml for a wrong bundle location

author: mturk
msg: Do not send flush packet if explicit is false
